Onboarding buddy, Tonya Sutphin, can help you participate in a Jahnel Group culture event. Send an email to tsutphin@jahnelgroup.com if you have any questions about culture events.

Culture Event

A Culture Event happens when two or more Jahnel Group employees hangout together for fun. Examples are Beer Club, lunch-time food competitions, Dungeons and Dragons games, and the spring or winter holiday parties. There are many ad hoc events that come up, such as someone having a BBQ out back, or people going to Wolf's for a birthday celebration.

1. Contact Tonya, tsutphin@jahnelgroup.com, to get the latest culture event information.

2. Pick an event and attend!
